item.title: 5th Oct 06: Ballard Neon VI
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description: 5th Oct 06: Ballard Neon VI, originally uploaded by machaggis. The dark nights are drawing in, so I return to the Ballard Neon series in order to add a little sparkle to aphotoperday. Vera’s is one of the old-school greasy breakfast joints in Ballard. If it wasn’t that we prefer the savoury and sweet baked … Continue reading "5th Oct 06: Ballard Neon VI"
item.content:encoded:
5th Oct 06: Ballard Neon VI, originally uploaded by machaggis.

The dark nights are drawing in, so I return to the Ballard Neon series in order to add a little sparkle to aphotoperday.
Vera’s is one of the old-school greasy breakfast joints in Ballard. If it wasn’t that we prefer the savoury and sweet baked treats from Besalu we’d be there more often.
{X50, as taken}

item.title: Photos Per Day
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description: Yesterday I finally caught up on the backlog and am now about to get back to an almost daily routine. I do think that the “batch upload” is sub-optimal – the three people who look at my website should be better served by occasional random pictures than a flood that they can’t keep track of … Continue reading "Photos Per Day"
item.content:encoded:
Yesterday I finally caught up on the backlog and am now about to get back to an almost daily routine.

I do think that the “batch upload” is sub-optimal – the three people who look at my website should be better served by occasional random pictures than a flood that they can’t keep track of – especially if they don’t do bloglines (how-to).

Here is a recap on the recent posts.

Back Home

21st Ballard Library by Night, 22nd Ballard Neon IV, 23rd Cadbury’s Fruit and Nut, 24th Ballard Neon V, 25th Cherry Blossom, 26th Chilly Hilly

Mexico

12th Los Voladores de Papantla, 13th Framed Danika, 14th Fish, 15th Stars in the Sky, 16th Taking the horses home, 17th Tricked out bike, 18th Patience, 19th Compulsory Sunset, 20th San Pancho Church

item.title: 22nd Feb 06: Ballard Neon IV
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description: 22nd Feb 06: Ballard Neon IV, originally uploaded by machaggis. The archetypal Ballard neon sign. This was off for a good period of January, so I was worried it had been lost to condos. When I returned from vacation and it was lit again I took a photo as soon as I could. {X50, as … Continue reading "22nd Feb 06: Ballard Neon IV"
item.content:encoded:
22nd Feb 06: Ballard Neon IV, originally uploaded by machaggis.

The archetypal Ballard neon sign. This was off for a good period of January, so I was worried it had been lost to condos. When I returned from vacation and it was lit again I took a photo as soon as I could.
{X50, as taken (propped against a telegraph pole)}

item.title: 25th Jan 06: Ballard Neon III

item.description: 25th Jan 06: Ballard Neon III, originally uploaded by machaggis. A wet night in Seattle, what could be more appropriate than the cosy glow of a neon coffee cup? {cropped to square}

item.title: 4th Jan 06: Ballard Neon I
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description: Ballard Neon I, originally uploaded by machaggis. Must try harder – running out of time today I snapped a handheld shot of one of the Ballard neon signs I ride by on my commute.{Dimage X50, handheld, cropped to square}

Ballard Neon I, originally uploaded by machaggis.
